message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I understand you want a larger share Alice, but this split is more reflective of the dwindling value of the pot.  Let's end this now and both walk away happy.
The value is decreasing rapidly, Bob. Take this offer before it dwindles further for both of us.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a perfectly fair 50/50 split. Take it before inflation eats away at your share too!
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but I need to secure a decent share. This is my final offer above 600k.  Let's be realistic - the clock is ticking.
Alright Alice, you've made your point.  This is a compromise - you get your 600k+, and I get a little more than my previous offer.  Take it before inflation makes this whole thing pointless!
